TopicTitle: Are there any good KER-like mods?

Articles.Content: I've used KER and other mods quality-of-life mods for KSP for a longer time now since they make the game so much more enjoyable, but I can't find any analogues to them in KSP 2. Does anybody know any? Help appreciated!
MicroEngineer does almost the same thing as KER.

Ok, thank you!

Will be used asap
Yeah Micro definitely scratches that itch.  Customizable, slap exactly as much or as little info that you want onto the screen.
